definition: (boxing) the act of one boxer holding onto the other to avoid being hit and to rest momentarily, to settle conclusively
details:
noun
- (boxing) the act of one boxer holding onto the other to avoid being hit and to rest momentarily
- a tight or amorous embrace
= synonyms: squeeze, hug
- a device (generally used by carpenters) that holds things firmly together
= synonyms: clamp
- the flattened part of a nail or bolt or rivet
- a small slip noose made with seizing
= synonyms: clench
verb
- to settle conclusively
= example: to settle conclusively
= synonyms: settle, square up, determine, square off
- to flatten the ends of nails and rivets
= example: to flatten the ends of nails and rivets
- to secure or fasten by flattening the ends of nails or bolts
= example: to secure or fasten by flattening the ends of nails or bolts
- to embrace amorously
- to hold in a tight grasp
= synonyms: clench
- to hold a boxing opponent with one or both arms so as to prevent punches
